name: Still Water
description:
Marina is a reporter for a local news company. She's come aboard a deep sea fishing vessel for a few weeks to get any stories she can out of the local fisherman. What else will she find in the unforgiving seas? 

Find out in this short form, four ending visual novel created for the 2022 Cosmic Horror Game Jam! It took Alexa and Dezz two weeks to complete this project - so it may be polished in the future.
